original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, blending deep analytical skills with strong communication and collaboration abilities. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and continuous improvement.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them clearly using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and identify optimal technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively translate technical information for non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to work cross-functionally and build consensus among diverse teams

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, which are crucial for developing and maintaining system configurations
- Experience with Agile methodologies, which can enhance your ability to deliver solutions iteratively and adapt to changing requirements

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and configuring complex enterprise systems, with a focus on vehicle configuration
- Proven track record of leveraging machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive process improvements and system enhancements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in an Agile environment, which can contribute to your ability to deliver solutions efficiently and collaboratively
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration domain, which can provide a strong foundation for understanding the specific business requirements and challenges

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration and management
- SQL and database querying tools for data analysis and reporting
- Data visualization tools for presenting insights and recommendations
- Agile project management tools for collaboration and task tracking

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will involve a blend of independent work and cross-functional collaboration, as you navigate the intersection of business needs and technical implementation
- You will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in enterprise system configuration, data analysis, and process improvement
- Flexibility and a willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements are essential, as you work to deliver solutions that drive business value

Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between our organization's business objectives and the technical systems that support them. As a highly analytical and technically proficient individual, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations, ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the needs of various stakeholders. Your focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive continuous optimization and improvement.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across the organization to deeply understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Utilize your technical expertise to develop and maintain configuration specifications within our [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and configurations
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to ensure they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Analyze existing data to identify opportunities for improvement, using database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for optimization
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, leveraging your knowledge of ML and AI to drive innovative solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the successful implementation and ongoing support of the system configurations you manage

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively convey technical information to non-technical stakeholders and build consensus across diverse teams
- Proficiency in leveraging machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive process improvements and system enhancements

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java and SQL, which are essential for developing and maintaining the configuration specifications within our [mention specific system]
- Experience working in an Agile environment, which can enhance your ability to deliver iterative solutions and adapt to changing requirements

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and implementing complex enterprise systems, with a specific focus on vehicle configuration
- Demonstrated experience in utilizing machine learning and artificial intelligence to optimize business processes and drive system improvements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in the vehicle configuration domain, which can provide valuable context and domain-specific knowledge
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which can contribute to your ability to collaborate effectively and deliver solutions efficiently

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration and management
- SQL and database querying tools for data analysis and reporting
- Data visualization tools for presenting insights and recommendations
- Agile project management tools for collaboration and task tracking

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will require a balance of independent work and cross-functional collaboration, as you navigate the intersection of business requirements and technical implementation
- You will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in enterprise system configuration, data analysis, and process improvement using ML and AI
- Flexibility and a proactive approach to problem-solving are essential, as you work to deliver innovative solutions that drive tangible business value

Role Overview:
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, where you will be responsible for ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the evolving needs of our organization. As a key player in our team, you will leverage your analytical skills and deep understanding of complex business processes to translate requirements into effective system configurations, with a focus on driving innovation and continuous improvement within the vehicle configuration space. Your ability to leverage machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) will be instrumental in identifying opportunities for optimization and streamlining operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows to document their needs clearly and concisely
- Translate the gathered business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Proactively analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to generate actionable insights
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices, leveraging your expertise in ML and AI to drive innovative solutions
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the successful implementation and seamless ongoing support of the system configurations you manage

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively convey technical information to non-technical stakeholders and build consensus across diverse teams
- Proficiency in leveraging machine learning and artificial intelligence to identify opportunities for process optimization and system improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java and SQL, which are essential for developing and maintaining the configuration specifications within our [mention specific system]
- Experience working in an Agile environment, which can enhance your ability to deliver iterative solutions and adapt to changing requirements

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and implementing complex enterprise systems, with a specific focus on vehicle configuration
- Demonstrated experience in utilizing machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive process improvements and system enhancements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in the vehicle configuration domain, which can provide valuable context and domain-specific knowledge
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which can contribute to your ability to collaborate effectively and deliver solutions efficiently

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration and management
- SQL and database querying tools for data analysis and reporting
- Data visualization tools for presenting insights and recommendations
- Agile project management tools for collaboration and task tracking

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will require a balance of independent work and cross-functional collaboration, as you navigate the intersection of business requirements and technical implementation
- You will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in enterprise system configuration, data analysis, and process improvement using ML and AI
- Flexibility, adaptability, and a proactive approach to problem-solving are essential, as you work to deliver innovative solutions that drive tangible business value and continuous improvement
